content.text: Not much, just got back from a ski trip. How about you?
I'm just waking up. I love skiing, but I'm not good at it.
Oh that's okay! I was scared to start but I'm so glad I did.
Are you a competitive ski racer?
No, but I've thought about it. I'm a pilot for Southwest Airlines.
Wow, that's awesome! I have a younger sibling, but I'm an only child.
Oh that must be lonely. I'm really close with my younger sister.
I don't mind it too much. I like having my own space.
I guess so. I like my space too, but it's nice to have someone to talk to sometimes.
Yeah, I can agree with that. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love the travel. I get to see a lot of different places.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to travel more.
You should! It's so much fun
